data.name: Gensokyo Odyssey
data.detailed_description:
After a commute to school goes awry, you find yourself lost in a strange land with your only weapon being a pong paddle. Use your non-existent charm and wit to join Reimu and Marisa in a hilarious quest to save the world! ...probably.

    Features

■ Talk to a wide array of characters

■ Pong-based fighting

■ Live-action elements

■ Le funny shenanigans

■ Multiple endings
data.about_the_game:
After a commute to school goes awry, you find yourself lost in a strange land with your only weapon being a pong paddle. Use your non-existent charm and wit to join Reimu and Marisa in a hilarious quest to save the world! ...probably.

    Features

■ Talk to a wide array of characters

■ Pong-based fighting

■ Live-action elements

■ Le funny shenanigans

■ Multiple endings
data.short_description: A Touhou satirical visual novel/RPG with live action parts and a script both written by a madman.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: get a computer from a space shuttle and use it for this game
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
